attributes.action: Create an independent appeals process for challenging unjust SORN penalties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Presumption of guilt in dealing with SORN penalties is against the rules of natural justice. Not having an independent appeals process to investigate appeals is wrong and unjust. If a person can prove that they were not the owner of a vehicle at the time of a  but have still been given a SORN penalty they should be found not guilty and not have to pay the fine.

The current system is not fair and penalizes law abiding families and should be changed to reflect the ideals we hold dear in Britain today.
